name: riot-api-nodejs
description: A NodeJS Library for Riot Games API

scripts.test: npm run dev-install && tsc && tslint -c tslint.json --project tsconfig.json
scripts.dev-install: npm i && npm i typescript@1.8.10 tslint@3.15.1 typings@1.3.3 && typings install

author: Zafix <willys58l@gmail.com>
